text: Nao makĩnjookeria atĩrĩ, “Andũ arĩa maahonokire gũtahwo, o acio marĩ kũu bũrũri-inĩ, marĩ na thĩĩna mũnene na makanyararwo mũno. Rũthingo rwa Jerusalemu nĩrũmomore, na ihingo ciaruo igacinwo na mwaki.”1:3 Wathani wa Perisia wagayanĩtio ngʼongo ithatũ; rũgongo rwa Juda rwathagwo kuuma Samaria.
